page.title: 14Theatre & Disco, Llandudno.
page.content:
{THEATRE: The Arcadia Theatre}features summer shows nightly from the Spring Bank Holiday to the end of September,. while the {Aberconwy Centre,}also puts on seasonal entertainment. There is an{Open Air Theatre in the Happy {Valley.} Artistes who have appeared in Llandud- no during the last few years include Moira Anderson, Frankie Vaughan, Max Boyce, The Spinners, Don Estelle, Freddy Davies, Paul Daniels, Little & Large, The Halle Orchestra, the Welsh National Opera and many others.
{DISCO:}The venue for many years has been the {Winter Gardens}in Gloddaeth Street. {Junior discos, roller discos, etc., are held at {Canolfan Aberconwy} throughout the year.
